short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The world's first AI generated content blocker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take back control of your browsing experience, support genuine content creators, and make the web a better place by filtering out all the AI-generated noise.

This extension is community-based, meaning we - HUMANS - decide if the content is real or AI-generated.

📄 What Content is Identified as “Is Generated”?
----------------------------
1. Text-Based Content: articles, blog posts, and written material that show signs of being automatically generated without meaningful human input.
2. Video Content: soulless or generic videos (e.g., YouTube, Facebook, TikTok) where narration, visuals, or scripts are entirely AI-produced.
3. Spammy or Low-Value Pages: websites using AI to generate content solely for clicks, ads, or SEO manipulation, offering little to no real value to users.

💡 What Does Is Generated Do for You?
----------------------------
1. Blocks websites that were reported as AI-generated.
2. Notifies you about pages suspected to be AI-generated.

💪 What Can You Do with Is Generated?
----------------------------
1. Report Pages: if you believe a page contains AI-generated content, report it via the extension popup.
2. Confirm or Dismiss Suspicious Pages: help validate community reports by agreeing with or disputing them.
3. Instantly Block Reported Pages: directly block any pages you think are AI-generated.

⬜ Is Generated adheres to Chrome's minimum permissions policy and requests only the following:
----------------------------
1. "storage": stores your settings and randomly generated 16 character client ID locally in your browser.
2. "tabs": retrieves the current page URL to match with server records in order to determine if it has been reported.

🔒 Privacy Guaranteed
----------------------------
Is Generated does not display ads, and it does not read, collect, or share your data. We only save your reported page URL.

💌 Support the Extension
----------------------------
Is Generated is completely FREE. You can support the extension by joining the community and helping to shape the future of this project or by donating to improve the development process.
